meanings.definition: A unit of volume equal to one hundredth of a liter.
meanings.sent1: I poured one centilitre of water into the glass.
meanings.sent2: The recipe calls for adding a centilitre of milk to the mixture.
meanings.sent3: He joked that he could only drink a centilitre of coffee to stay awake.
meanings.sent4: Her love for cooking was so immense that every centilitre of ingredient was carefully measured.
meanings.sent5: The tiny centilitre of perfume was enough to fill the room with a pleasant scent.

meanings.sent1: The bartender poured a centilitre of vodka into the cocktail shaker.
meanings.sent2: She measured exactly one centilitre of orange juice for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: The tiny centilitre of sauce added a burst of flavor to the dish.
meanings.sent4: His words were like a centilitre of poison, slowly affecting everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The precious centilitre of medicine saved the patient's life.
